EndoTools 0.3.7

  • Changelog

Assign ACE variables into numeric scores

assign_ace_vars.Rd

Each ACE variable is assigned into numeric scores ranging from 0 to 3.

assign_ace_vars(
  ace_mi,
  ace_cad,
  ace_chf,
  ace_arr,
  ace_htn,
  ace_vd,
  ace_pad,
  ace_res,
  ace_hep,
  ace_sto,
  ace_pan,
  ace_rd,
  ace_dm,
  ace_str,
  ace_dem,
  ace_par,
  ace_neu,
  ace_psy,
  ace_rhe,
  ace_aid,
  ace_st,
  ace_lm,
  ace_lym,
  ace_alc,
  ace_id,
  ace_obe
)

Arguments

ace_mi

Myocardial Infarction

ace_cad

Angina / Coronary Heart Disease

ace_chf

Congestive Heart Failure

ace_arr

Arrhythmias

ace_htn

Hypertension

ace_vd

Venous Disease

ace_pad

Peripheral Arterial Disease

ace_res

Respiratory System

ace_hep

Hepatic

ace_sto

Stomach / Intestine

ace_pan

Pancreas

ace_rd

End-stage renal disease

ace_dm

Diabetes Mellitus

ace_str

Stroke

ace_dem

Dementia

ace_par

Paralysis

ace_neu

Neuromuscular

ace_psy

Psychiatric

ace_rhe

Rheumatologic

ace_aid

AIDS

ace_st

Solid Tumor including melanoma

ace_lm

Leukemia and Myeloma

ace_lym

Lymphoma

ace_alc

Alcohol

ace_id

Illicit Drugs

ace_obe

Obesity

Contents
